choices: You want to be a woman
11.title: Daniel, An adult man

choices: Lyndsey, your high school child's friend
111.content:
You had stolen some money from a local organization and she found out about it.

Who found out?
111.title: You stole something

choices: Bluff and keep claiming it's not you
1112.content:
"Hi girls, come on in." you say ushering the girls through the doorway. You were fairly certain you were being paranoid but ever since you had taken that money you couldn't help it.
"Can I get you something to eat, drink?"
"No thanks." your daughter said.
"Oh I'd love something thanks." said Lyndsey
"Well I'm going to go grab a shower then." said your daughter. They were both on a sports team and looked it. Both now fresh from practice you admitted they were both girls you would have fancied in high school and both girls who would have beat you up in high school.
Your daughter went upstairs while you lead Lyndsey into the kitchen to whip something up for her.
"Liz was telling me her Mum is taking her away to Ibiza this summer." said Lyndsey.
"Yeah I'd heard." you said glumly. Your wife had always been more successful than you and when you had split up she had taken most of what you had. That was why you had taken the money and knowing that you weren't the same whimpy kid from highschool you quickly said. "Yeah but that's nothing compared to where I'm taking her for new year." you said with a twinkle. You might not have been able to impress someone like Lyndsey in High school but you bet you could now.
"Where's that McDonalds." she said laughing.
"No. I haven't quite decided yet. maybe Rome or Venice. Maybe both." you said smugly.
"And how are you going to afford that?" she asks.
"I have my ways." you say slyly.
"What like robbing people?"
You cough "what are you on about?"
"You've got no money and yet your promising to take your daughter to Rome for New Year?"
"Grown ups have ways Lyndsey."
"And youre a grown up now?"
"Yes I am young lady and you will not speak to me in that tone?" you say glaring at her.
"Won't I? You know it's funny, Dan! If Lyndsey wants anything she has to go to her Mum but all of a sudden she's been coming to school in new kit, talking about you promising her a car for her Birthday and now taking her away on Holiday. Funny considering what's happening in the news recently isn't it. The first national bank loosing all that money. Where do you work again Dan?"
You froze, she didn't know anything you were sure of it.
"Are you implying I took that money?"
"No I'm not implying anything." she said. "I'm saying your a piss poor father and your an even worse thief." she said through a smile.
1112.title: Lyndsey, your high school child's friend

1122.content:
Your intercom buzzes. "Mr Grisham." your secretary's voice comes out of the speaker. "There's a woman here to see you. She says her name is Jane."

"Send her in." you say in the most business-like tone you can manage.

"Cute secretary." Jane comments as she shuts and locks the door. "You fucking her too?"

"No." you answer honestly, it's not that you don't want to. It's just too much of a risk. If she complained of sexual harassment your wife would definitely find out.

As she approaches your desk, she drops articles of clothing to the carpet until she is standing completely naked in front of you.

You fuck her on your desk, thankful for your relatively soundproof office.

"So I'll see you this weekend?" Jane asks as she redresses and rearranges her hair.

"Yeah." you reply. "I told my wife I'll be away on a business trip."

Jane leaves and you get back to work. However, before you really get a chance to start, Susan, your secretary comes in.

"Someone's been a naughty boy." she says. You can see that she is holding a small voice recorder. She presses a button on the device.

"I told my wife I'll be away on a business trip." it taunts you in your own voice.

"I got the fun part too." she rewinds a bit and plays a recording of Jane's panting and moaning.

"What do you want?" you get straight to business.

"I'll let you know tomorrow." she says. "Until then I'm going home early."

With that she leaves.
1122.title: Susan, Your secretary

11221.content:
You barely sleep that night. What is Susan going to ask for? Does she want money?

Susan comes to work an hour late and walks into your office as though she owns it.

Over her shoulder is a large bag.

"What is that?" you ask nervously.

"You'll find out soon enough." she says. "First take off all of your clothes."

"What?" you ask.

"You will do as I say." she says sternly. "Disobedience will result in punishment and if you refuse your punishment or continue to disobey I'll tell your wife about Jane."
11221.title: Go to work tomorrow

112211.content:
You quickly strip.

"Good boy." she praises you. "You see you can behave yourself when you try."

Once you are completely naked she unzips the bag and pulls out a large disposable diaper.

"A diaper?" you ask.

"Yes." she says, unfolding it. "You will wear diapers from now on." She lays it open on the floor. "Lay down."
112211.title: Take off your clothes

choices: Put your clothes on over the diaper
1122111.content:
You sit on the thick padding any lay back on the floor.

"Now. I realise that can't supervise you outside of the office but while you are at work you will be in diapers all of the time." she explains as she pulls the front of the diaper up between your legs and fastens the tapes. "You will not change your own diaper. Ask me and I'll do it if I'm not too busy."

"Change?" you ask. "What do you mean."

"You'll be using your diapers." she explains as you get back to your feet. "If I catch you going to the toilet you will be punished. Do you understand?"

You nod.

"Good." she says, leaving. "You can put your clothes back on if you like."
1122111.title: Lay on the diaper

choices: Paddling and Stay in the Same Diaper All Day.
11221111.content:
You wait till Secretary Leaves leaves, and then quickly remove the diaper. You then put it in the trashcan, underneath lots of other trash, so she won't be able to see it. The day goes on normally from then on. After awhile, however, you get the urge to pee. You know you can't go out to the bathroom, as she will see you. So, you do everything you can to hold it until lunch time. She always leaves for lunch before you, and comes back afterwards, so you figure you can just slip out, then. It is a difficult battle, and you're not sure you're going to make it, without wetting your seat. But finally, the time comes, and you discreetly open your door, looking both ways for her, before stepping out. Just then, though, you hear her clearing her throat.

You gasp, and quickly turn your head towards her.

"Where do we think we're going??" She says, sternly, her hands on her hips.

"Um, I was just, uh...." You stutter.

"Just going to lunch, huh? Well, before you go, let me check and see if you're wet... wait," She looks hard at your midsection, "you are wearing your diaper, right."

"Oh, of course!" You say, qiuckly.

"Come here!" She says, sounding even more stern.

""Keep your voice down," your whisper,

"That's it, I'm calling your wife."

"No, no! Wait!"

You quickly scurry over to her, and she stands right beside you, crabbing your butt.

"You NAUGHTY Boy!" She says, loud enough, your sure anyone who DIDn'T see her groping your, could hear.

"That's it! Someone needs to be punished! Follow me!" You reluctantly follow her into your office, and you notice she is carrying some sort of bag.

"Alright, that's very naughty of you for taking your diaper off. Fortunately, I figured you'd try something like this. That's why I got... THESE," She says, pulling what looks to be a pair of rubber panties out of the bag.

"What??"

"These are a pair of locking rubber panties, so that only I can remove your diapers. But before I put you into them, and your diapers, there is the matter of punishing you."

"P, punish me? What do you mean?" You ask, more than a little worried.

"Well," she says with a sly, mischievous smile, "Since this is your first infringement, I'll let YOU decide. "

"Either I can spank you right here with a paddle, and that will be the end of it or, you can choose to have me put itching powder in your diaper, and leave it there for an hour."

You immediatley say. "Well, the spanking sounds alot better, seeing as it will be over the quickest." (PLus, you think, it probably won't even HURT, coming from HER)

"Ah, ah, ah," She says, "There's a little more to the spanking option though. If you choose that one, I will immediately put your into a diaper and these locking rubber pants, and no matter what you do in them, I will not be changing you until quiting time."

Yikes! That changes things alot. There's still six more hours until quiting time, and you really need to go, RiGHT NOW.
11221111.title: Take the diaper off

choices: Itching gets to much and takes it off
112211111.content:
He quickly chooses itching powder. So she laid him down and rediapered him powdering him with itching powder.
Now if you take this off I will give you a spanking.
112211111.title: Itching Powder For One Hour

choices: Use the diaper before your meeting
11221112.content:
You put your shirt back on and pull your pants up over the diaper. Fortunately, they are loose enough to fit over the thick padding. Unsure of what to do with your underpants, you put them in your briefcase then return to your work.

Before long you begin to feel the need to pee. There are hours before you can reasonably leave and you aren't sure that you can hold on that long. To make things worse, you're going into a long meeting in about half an hour.
11221112.title: Put your clothes on over the diaper

choices: You want to be a girl
12.title: Stephen, A boy in highschool

1222.content: As I walked into school the first day back from vacation, I was told by my best friend Bradly that we were getting our exam results back today. As my teacher gave me my test paper back,it stated a grade of an A, but I was not overcome with joy more like guilt knowing I cheated of a answer sheet that day;the only person who knew about that was Bradly. As I glanced my head towards Bradly i saw him smile at me, thinking I did as badly as he did with a D. As Bradly strolled over to me to compare results he stares at my result in utter shock and disbelief and storms of,furious. When you finally got home that day I saw a letter stating my name on the front. It was from...
1222.title: Bradley, Your friend

1223.content:
You look around nervously. All of your fellow students are writing frantically on their Science exams. You risk a glance at the teacher, Mr Harrison. Luckily he isn't looking at you.

You carefully pull out the notes you'd smuggled in and find the section which corresponds to the question which you are currently stuck on. You feel terrible as you fill in the answer but you're failing Science and need to get more than 60% on this exam to avoid failing the semester.

You have to look up quite a few more answers before the end. You can't even look at Mr Harrison as he collects your paper.

On your way out of the classroom, Kate, a girl you barely know moves next to you and whispers. "I saw you cheating. come with me if you don't want anyone else to know."

You don't know what else to do so you follow her into an empty classroom and she closes the door.

"What do you want?" you ask.

"First I want your notes." she says. "The ones you have up your sleeve."

You pull out the notes and hand them to her.

She unfolds them and glances through them, smiling. "Good. Now I want you to write and sign a confession."

"What?" you ask. "I thought you weren't going to tell anyone if I came with you."

"I won't" she says, handing you a sheet of lined paper and a pen. "If you do what I say. The confession is just to make sure you don't change your mind."
1223.title: Kate, A girl at school

12231.content:
"fine" you say "but you promise to not tell anyone"

"I won't tell a soul" Kate said

You write the confession and sign it with your signature.

"I had my fingers crossed" Kate said

"What?" I said confused

"I lied and now I have this blackmail, I can make you do whatever i want"she said

"Why you little!" I shouted

"If you do anything out of line then I'll scream, show the evidence and you'll be expelled" Kate threatened

"Fine, what shall I do for you" I asked

"Meet me after school tomorrow, at my house, with some pink diapers, a pink baby onesie and a pacifier" Kate said

"Why?" I asked

"Don't. Ask. Questions." Kate said

"Ok fine, but if I do this, you will burn the confession" I said

"Yes, yes, whatever" she said

"You must promise" I said

"Maybe" she said
12231.title: Write the confession

122311.content:
It's the next days after school and your walking to Kate's house, it just so happens that your pearents are away for a week ( your 16) and Kate's pearents are away for a week and it's the first day of the half term holidays which last a week.

On the way to Kate's house you stop of at the baby store, you buy a pack of 20 large pink diapers, 1 large pink onesie and a pacifier. You walk up to the till and are paying, there is a hot emo girl behind the counter showing a fair amount of cleavage.

She giggled as she said "are these for you?"

"Err... yeah..." you mumble, almost hypnotised by her tits "wait, what?"

"You want some more *giggle* I bet you can't wait to try them on" she says

"No! I... I...." you trail off

She chuckles "here you go" and hands you 4 more onesies and 6 more pacifiers "have fun ickle bwabwy heh he he"

"Whatever" you say and walk to Kate's house

You get there and walk in.

"So," I say "what do you need me to do? Please don't say babysitting"

"Not exactly" Kate says "it's a photoshoot"

"And I'm the model? Why do we need this baby stuff then?" I ask

"Because... it's an ABDL photoshoot" she says

"What!? There no way in a thousand years you would get me in a diaper and baby onesies and then take a picture of me!!"

"Would you like to be expelled?" She asked deviously

"I... I..." I paused "fine! Aslong as no one sees them" I say

"It's a bloody school project! Everyone will see them, unless I can dress you up" she explains

"I'm listening" you says and beckon her to continue

"Well, I have, breast forms, we'll shave you, put your in a wig and cover your face in makeup, no one will recognise you" she said

"Fine! But you burn the paper afterwards" I said

"Yeah... ok, whatever, let's get on with it" she said
122311.title: Next day after school

choices: "Fine, but your changing my diapers everyday"
1223111.content:
"ok, let's start, you need to take all your clothes off, all of them" she say

I felt awkward but i said nothing and stripped down.

"First we need to rid of that disgusting body hair" she went to her bedroom and came back with lots of wax strips. "We'll use these" she said

She started to wax my body and it really hurt, first my legs, moving to my genitals (which was awkward), then my arms, chest, armpits and everywhere else. It hurt like hell. I nearly cried at one point.

"Right" Kate said "let's put this diaper on you"

I sighed and went and laid down on a soft baby table she had and she put the diaper on me, I kind of enjoyed it and wasn't sure why and then I stood in my diaper and felt how soft it was and was acctually really liking it.

She walked up to me, holding two large, what looked like blobs in her hands. She put them on my chest and glued them there.

"How long until this glue comes off?" I said

"Oh... errr... not long" Kate said

"Ok" I said

Next was the baby onesie. There was some buttons at the back and as I was quite small I could just fit my legs in, getting it past my diaper was the hardest part but I managed to do it. Then I put my arms in and Kate buttoned it up at the back.

It was soft yet very tight, uncomfortable but I kinda liked it.

After this we started with my makeover, Kate covered my face in foundation, put some mascara on my eyelashes, popped a pacifier in my mouth (which I enjoyed sucking) and put a long blonde wig on my head with she then tied in pig tails.

For some reason I felt more comfortable in this diaper, a baby onesie andaleup than I had any other time in my life, I was loving it and I also had a bit of a crush on Kate so that was a bonus but I was still very embarrassed about it so I wanted to get away as quick as possible.

"Now let's take the pictures" Kate said

She snapped a couple of pictures.

"Ok, now examine your outfit!" She said

I did so and she took another picture.

-https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-0I2DU...

"Ok, happy? Good! Now that confession" I said

"I already have" Kate said "along with your boy clothes"

"You what, so I'm stuck with baby girls clothes?!" I said

"Yes, for a week, till my pearents get home and can buy you see new ones" Kate said
1223111.title: Start getting changed

124.title: You want to be a girl

1241.content:
You are Stephen Johnson.

You seem to be a normal 15 year old Highschool student but you have a embarrassing secret.

For as long as you've been aware that boys and girls are different you've felt that you would much rather have been a girl.

Fairly early, you learned the hard way that boys are not meant to want to be girls. Your parents laughed at you when you were four and you told them you wanted a pretty dress for your birthday and you were teased by everyone in your class on your first day of school when you asked one of the girls if you could play dolls with her.

Since then you've kept your feelings to yourself. A few weeks ago however you overrode your fears and started to put on the clothes of your 16 year old sister Janet and to walk around in them in Janet's room when you had a few hours to yourself you.

Right now you are again in Janet's room wearing one of Janet's beautiful red summer dresses one of her's pink bras, a pair of pink panties and red high heels when you suddenly hear the click of a camera and shortly after that you see Janet entering the room.

"Stephen I allways knew that you are weird but I never thought that you would be that weird. Now let me explain what I am going to do with you now. You will either do what I say which includes wearing and using diapers all the or I will show this picture to everyone.

And just to prove that I am not cruel I promise that I will let you wear some of my clothes when we two are alone in my room if you choose to cooperate." Janet explains.

What will you do?
1241.title: Janet, Your sister

12412.content:
"No way." you say, "I'm not going to wear diapers."

"You want me to show everyone this photo?" she asks.

"You wouldn't." you say, hoping that it is true.

"Oh. I would." she says. "And just to prove it I'm going to show one person."

"Who?" you ask nervously.

"I'll let you choose." she says with a smile. "Your girlfriend, Rachel, might be interested to know that you like to prance around in dresses. On the other hand it might be more fun for me if I let my friend Tanya in on the secret."
12412.title: Refuse to cooperate

choices: Beg  Janet not to show Rachel the picture
124121.content:
You are tired of keeping your feelings to yourself all the time. And Rachel is the only person you know that could be open-minded and understanding enough to accept your true personality. And besides of that you feel guilty for hiding this important part of your live for Rachel. You wanted to tell Rachel since you two get together three months ago but you never had the guts to do so. So actually Janet would do you a fravor by showing the photo to Rachel so your choice is clear.

"Just show Rachel the picture." you answer.
"Suit yourself brother or should I say sister? I had hope that you choose her. It will be fun to see her reaction. I just sent her a SMS to come over here and she just replieed that she will be here in 15 minutes." Janet replies.
124121.title: Choose Rachel

1251.content:
You finally have the house to yourself. It's Friday evening and your parents are away for the whole weekend. Your sister, Janet, is even going to be sleeping at a friend's place Tonight and tomorrow. You'll have all the privacy you need.

After Janet leaves, you force yourself to wait a few minutes, just to be sure. Then you open your wardrobe and pull you the items you've prepared for this opportunity. You bought everything last weekend. It took a lot of effort to work up the courage to buy them but you knew you would regret it if you didn't.

You go straight for the bag of diapers and excitedly tear it open. You pull out one of the thick white diapers and feel it's smooth plastic cover. You're finally going to get to try one on. You unfold it onto your bed and quickly undress.

Once you are completely naked, you lay on top of the padding and pull it up between your legs then fasten the tapes. You instantly feel babyish and quickly retrieve a pacifier from your collection of purchases ant place it into your mouth. Perfect. You never want this weekend to end.
1251.title: Janet, Your sister

choices: Get up and change your diaper
Stay in bed a little longer
12511.content:
You fill two baby bottles with milk and climb into bed. After finishing both bottles, you put your pacifier back into your mouth and fall asleep cuddling a large teddy bear.

You wake up early Saturday morning, needing to pee. You try to use your diaper but years of being potty-trained makes your bladder refuse at first. Determined, you try to relax and manage to release a little pee into the diaper.

You feel it trickle down between your legs down to the padding against your bottom where it soaks into the diaper. Having already peed a little, your body stops fighting you and lets you completely wet yourself.
12511.title: Get into bed

choices: Wait untill you've messed this one
125112.content:
You remain in bed, enjoying the babyish feeling of being in a wet diaper. However, as the sun comes up you grow bored to laying in bed and decide to get up.

Your soggy diaper droops a little as you stand up. You should probably change it soon but you usually need to poop around this time in the morning so maybe you should wait until then and not waste a diaper.
125112.title: Stay in bed a little longer

choices: Demand that she delete the photo
1251122.content:
With your pacifier still in your mouth, you waddle out of your room, dressed only in your wet diaper.

"Good morning Stephen." You freeze on the spot in panic when you find your sister, Janet, sitting on the sofa. "It looks like someone needs a diaper change." She is holding a camera and quickly snaps a photo of you.
1251122.title: Wait untill you've messed this one

choices: Ask her to change your diaper
12511222.content:
The pacifier falls from your mouth as you demand. "Delete that photo now!"

"You aren't really in any position to give orders." she says with a smile. "And anyway, deleting this one won't help you. I got plenty last night while you were asleep. You looked so cute with your diaper and pacifier, cuddling your teddy bear."

"What?" you ask, failing to cover your diaper with your hands. "I thought you were staying with a friend?"

"I was snooping in your wardrobe this week and found the things you had hidden there. I guessed they were for this weekend." She explains. "So I cancelled my sleep over and we went to see a movie instead os I could come home and catch you."

"Why?" you ask.

"You're going to do whatever I tell you." she says. "Unless you want everyone to know that you like playing baby."

"What do you want?" you are almost too afraid to ask.

"Don't worry." She says, her smile growing. "Until Mom and Dad come back I only want you to do what you were planning on doing anyway. Act like a big baby."

"You just want me to stay in diapers?" you ask, a little confused.

"Yep." she says. "With a couple of rules. One, the toilet is off limits. You'll be using your diapers, although I can see you don't have a problem with that. Two, You can't change your own diapers. And Three, You will not dress or undress yourself. Understood?"

You nod.

"Now, If you ask me nicely I'll change your diaper." She says.
12511222.title: Demand that she delete the photo

choices: Ask Janet to make an exception and let you use the toilet
125112221.content:
"Please change my diaper." you ask.

"Okay." she says. "Put your pacifier back in your mouth and bring a clean diaper and your baby wipes."

You do as you are told and quickly return. Janet has spread a towel on the floor to use as a changing mat. "Lay down." she directs you.

You obey and she untapes your soggy diaper and pulls it open between your legs. Instinctively you move your hands to cover your privates.

"Get your hands out of the way." she tells you as she takes a few baby wipes. "Baby boys don't get to be shy about other people seeing their little pee pees."

You reluctantly move your hands to your sides and stare at the ceiling as she begins wiping you clean. You find that sucking on your pacifier comforts you.

Soon she is satisfied that you're clean enough and she rolls up the used diaper before sliding the new one under your bottom. She then seals you into the diaper and helps you up.

"Are you going to say thank you?" she prompts.

"Thankyou Janet." you say around your pacifier.

"Good boy." she says. "Now go sit at the table and I'll get you some breakfast."

You wait at the table as Janet disposes of the wet diaper and washes her hands.

She returns with a plastic bowl and spoon which she places on the table in front of you. The bowl is full of some strange translucent mush.

"Baby food." she informs you, pulling the pacifier out of your mouth. "I did some shopping of my own." She takes a spoonful and brings it you your mouth. "Here comes the airplane."

You accept the spoon. The babyfood tastes strange. Not bad, it's sweet but an odd mixture of flavors.

Soon you have finished the whole bowl. Janet wipes your face with a damp cloth to get the bits that missed your mouth then lets you up. "Okay you can watch your cartoons now." she says.

You are halfway to the sofa when you get a familiar feeling. You're going to need to poop soon. You were planning on using you diaper but that was when you thought you would be alone. Can you really do it with your sister here, and then have her change your messy diaper.
125112221.title: Ask her to change your diaper

choices: Wait for Janet to change you
Tell her to ask one of her friends
1251122211.content:
If she wants to play this game then she can deal with messy diapers too. Maybe it will even convince her to stop this.

You stop on the spot and squat slightly, then push the mess out into the seat of your diaper. The back of the diaper expands as it fills and the mess spreads across your bottom. You find that this is the most babyish feeling so far, to just mess your diaper in the middle of the living room, and in front of your sister.

Janet, obviously watching the lump growing in the seat of your diaper starts laughing. "I cant believe you actually just pooped yourself."

"You told me I couldn't use the toilet." you reply.

"I know. I just didn't think you'd be so enthusiastic." she says still laughing. "Well enjoy your cartoons."

"You're not going to change my diaper?" you ask.

"I just did. You can wait a few hours." she replies.

"What?" you as. "You want me to sit in a messy diaper for hours?"

"I didn't think you'd mind." she says. "But you you want to be changed sooner I'll need some help taking care of you. I'll have to ask one of my friends to come and change you."
1251122211.title: Mess your diaper.

choices: Convince your parents that you've become incontinent
1252.content:
"Do you mind If I use your computer?" Kate asks, not even bothering to wait for an answer before sitting at the keyboard.

Your heart rate begins to increase. You haven't cleared your internet history. All of those incriminating websites are just waiting to pop up in your browser. How can you get her away from your computer without it seeming suspicious?

You don't have time to think of an answer to that question.

"What is this?" Kate asks, staring at a web page titled "Diaper Stories"

"I don't know." you say hoping to sound innocent. "How did you get there?"

"It was in your browser history." she says, already reading the content. "You're into this stuff."

"No." you insist weakly, wondering if jumping out of the window might help your situation.

"Well you seem to be looking at a lot of it." she scrolls through the last 20 pages you visited.

"I..." you stammer, having no idea what to say. "Um."

"There's no point lying." she says. "You want to wear diapers don't you?"

You nod.

"And I guess you don't want anyone to know that." she says.

"You're not going to tell are you?" you almost beg.

"That depends." she says. "On whether you do what I tell you."

"What do you want?" you ask.

"The same thing you do." she says with a smile "For you to be back in diapers."

"Why?" you ask.

"Because I prefer to be in the dominant position in a relationship." she says. "Keeping you in diapers will make your position clear."

"So what do I need to do?" you ask.

"You can either convince your parents that you've suddenly become incontinent or just start wearing diapers and keep it secret from them if you can." she says. "But either way I want you diapered full-time within a week."
1252.title: Kate, Your girlfriend

choices: "I think they will start in a few moments when I am in the living room."
"I think they will start with wetting my bed tonight."

You don´t like the idea of wetting and messing yourself in front of your parents so that they put you back in diapers but the alternative just start wearing diapers and keep it secret from them would not only be much more stressful but you also couldn't afford to buy full-time supplies of disposable diapers which means that you would have to use cloth diapers which you probably would have to wash yourself.

So you tell Kate while blushing red "I think I will start to have "accidents" again soon".

"When do you think will your "accidents" start?" Kate asks

How will you answer?

125211.content:
"I will now go in the living room and try to convince my parents that I need diapers." you answer.

Then you and Kate walk into the living room where your parents are watching TV.

info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You have a secret, a secret that you would do anything to keep. Unfortunately someone learns your secret. They promise to keep it on one condition. That you wear diapers... indefinitely.
